author: Krisztian Sandor
title: Bitcoin Climbs Above $110K, 'At Crossroads' for Next Major Move
description: One analyst characterized bitcoin's recovery from last week's decline as a "peaceful rally," with buyers stepping in to support the uptrend.
content:
Bitcoin's 
 quiet climb on Monday accelerated to its strongest price in June, rebounding from last week's decline to near all-time high levels.The largest crypto advanced by 3.7% over the past 24 ho… [+2143 chars]
